name: makeup-next-id
description: Assign the next id in sequence to an element, if an id property does not already exist.
author: Ian McBurnie <ianmcburnie@hotmail.com>

scripts.start: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run server" "npm run watch"
scripts.test: npm run build:module && npm run build:tests && karma start --autoWatch false --singleRun true
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:docs
scripts.build: npm run build:module && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:docs: npm run transpile:docs && npm run bundle:docs && npm run clean:docs
scripts.build:tests: npm run bundle:tests && npm run clean:tests
scripts.lint: eslint src/index.js > lint.txt && eslint docs/src/index.js > lint.txt
scripts.server: browser-sync start -s --ss docs --index docs/index.html --files docs/index.html docs/dist/bundle.js
scripts.watch: onchange src/index.js docs/src/index.js -- npm run build
scripts.version: npm run prepublishOnly && git add -A docs/static test/static
